title: Pixel 5 reboots randomly while browsing all the time
content:
I am over this new pixel 5.  Reboots randomly with no obvious reason 25 times a day.  Did all the usual... Factory reset,  removed apps, cleared cached etc etc but no cure. All updates are installed.

Going back to Samsung s21 tomorrow which is a shame as I batted through every pixel phone since they started.

Quality control is just plain poor

I'm over it. what a waste of money and time
